name: Let's clean this SHIP up!
description:
In this mini game you need pick up all the trash in the sea, you can exchange it for money to upgrade your boat, so you can pick up even more trash but much faster! Can you help to clean the oceans?

Controls:

  • Accelerate: W or UpArrow
  • Brake: S or DownArrow (You can't go in reverse)
  • Turn: A/D or LeftArrow/RightArrow

-------------------------------------------------------------

This game was made in 7 days for the SeaJam!

Make sure to donate to MrBeast and help him clean up the ocean!

Link: https://teamseas.org/

(If the web version doesn't work download the game below )
